scripts.pack: npm run clean && npm run pack:osx && npm run pack:win
scripts.pack:osx: npm run prep && npm run clean:osx && electron-packager . 'Before Dawn' --out=dist/osx --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=0.36.4 --icon='assets/icon.icns'  --overwrite --ignore='dist/'
scripts.pack:win: npm run prep && npm run clean:win && electron-packager . 'Before Dawn' --out=dist/win --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --version=0.36.4 --icon=assets/icon.ico --ignore='dist/'
scripts.build: npm run build:osx && npm run build:win
scripts.build:osx: npm run pack:osx && electron-builder "dist/osx/Before Dawn-darwin-x64/Before Dawn.app" --platform=osx --out="dist/osx" --config=build.json
